Question.Subject: Erg. D: Youtube stopping working with IE6!?
Question.Content: And I need to download IE8, but when I downloaded it last time it gave me error messages everytime I closed out of the internet. D: How can I fix this problem. And I'm not allowed to download anything OTHER than IE8.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Youtube will no longer be supporting IE6, you will need to update to the latest version of IE8, here: http://www.microsoft.com/Windows/internet-explorer/
Cheers, Kyler IE8 Outreach Team

Answer.Content:
Youtube will no longer be supporting IE6, you will need to update to the latest version of IE8, here: http://www.microsoft.com/Windows/internet-explorer/
